There's only one reason I reserved one star: the fit is not always the same. Within the same size, some are tighter fitting than others. I've never had to send one back, but I noticed that they don't all fit exactly the same. They are very simple construction, but well-made. And this is something you can wear in any season. They can serve as a soft under garment to keep you warm, or under a blouse buttoned or open. When it's warm you can wear it on it's own. They are very reasonably priced, and you can wear them year round. I like them very much. (I haven't washed these yet, so I don't know how color-fast they are.)

I ordered 3 tops and all were my size according to the size chart but all were too small in the bust. I returned them all in one bag with one code, but only got reimbursed for 1 top because I didn't realized I needed 3 codes!!! So I'm out the money I guess. Amazon is great with returns but there is no where to talk to or email them to explain what happened to I'm writing it in my review. Very disappointed to be out the $40 some dollars!

I bought this to wear as an undershirt to a semi-sheer silk blouse and, for that purpose, it does the job. I like that it is v-neck and has wide straps. The fabric seems nice upon first impression. My only complaint is that the darts are poorly designed. They angle up instead of coming straight across and end up much too high; I do not think I could wear this on its own for that reason, although it might be fine under a blazer or cardigan. If anyone from the company is reading this - please make clothes for a wider range of body types. Almost all Chinese-made clothes I buy on Amazon are not for curvy women.
